comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
See comments concerning this photo of the area of the seaplane base adjacent to the subject of the photo above.  This is the New York Seaplane Base (aka Babylon Seaplane Base) located at Dalton's Point in Babylon, Long Island.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/6432986413/in/photostream/]
